Posts.Content: Hi All new to this so I hope I am doing this right. I have just found out I have Grade 3 Invasive ductal cancer I had a Lumpectomy with clear margins.But 3 Lymph Nodes had cancer one was attached to some tissue. I have ME and Fibromylgia so I am quite concerned about how Chemo and Radiotherapy will affect it. I feel very very frightened and think I am on the way out.  I will be starting Chemo in about 2 weeks time. My stomach churns all the time. I just don't know what to expect. Is it better to have Chemo through a Cannular or Picc line? How was anyone affected by chemo? Sorry for all the questions.
Posts.Title: New to the Group worrying about the whole Breast Cancer situation...

Posts.Content: Hi I still have a lingering Blue\Green blob on my boob. Its been 5 weeks now. I was told it can linger up to a year, fading slowly. Oh the joys!!! X
Posts.Title: Blue/green dye from Sentinel Node Biopsy
